content: embrace the crisp autumn air with this stylish and cozy autumn alpine ear warmer about this pattern this crochet ear warmer is written for 5 different sizes ranging from newborn to adult the instruction portion of the pattern is 2 pages long the pattern includes a full-length video tutorial here s an excerpt of the pattern writing style chain 1 see notes half_double_crochet 5 into circle chain 1 & turn 5 half_double_crochet to fit head sizes newborn 13-14 in 33-35 5 cm 0-6 months 14-17 in 35 5-43 cm 6-12 months 16-19 in 40 5-48 cm 1-3 years 18-20 in 46-51 cm 3-12 years 20-22 in 51-56cm teen/adult 22-24 in 56-61 cm stitches used chain - chain double_crochet - double_crochet fpdc - front post double_crochet repeat - repeat rs - right side single_crochet- single_crochet slip_stitch - slip_stitch space - space st s - stitch es ws - wrong side yo slip_stitch - yarn over slip_stitch supplies used hook *size g 4 mm hook yarn k+c superwash wool luxe size 2 fine weight 100% superwash merino fine wool 215 yds/197m per 100g large sewing needle
